display_name: Sleep Problem: How Often: Need for coffee or other stimulants to stay awake during day
description:
Survey3: From mailed survey 3 (mailing year: :survey_year_s3:)

Two questions that were asked in the "Sleep Problem" section of Survey 1 and Survey 2 were dropped in Survey 3. Thus the "O" variable names (Q13O_S1 and Q15O_S2 ) have the same wording as the "M" variable (Q10M_S3) in Survey3.

[Search for all questionaire questions from Sleep Problem category within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/wsc/variables?search=sleep_problem)
